Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/59th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Damen, 55th & Ashland, due to fire department activity near Ashland/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 63rd, Damen, 55th, then resume their normal route at Ashland, due to fire department activity near Ashland/59th.

Allow extra travel time.
